title: Total utility from apples and oranges

content.description:

Assume that apples cost $1 each, oranges cost $2 each, and the consumer spends the entire income of $7 on apples and oranges.

Using the concept of marginal utility per dollar spent, identify the combination of apples and oranges the consumer will purchase. Explain your reasoning.
